mapper.select: SELECT GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID , GTR.ATHR_ID , GTR.USR_ID , GTR.GD_TR_TTL , GTR.GD_TR_ST_DT , GTR.GD_TR_ED_DT , GTR.GD_TR_MX_NP , GTR.GD_TR_PRPS , GTR.GD_TR_MP , GTR.GD_TR_PRC , GTR.GD_TR_SMRY , GTR.GD_TR_RSTR_DT , GTR.GD_TR_MDFY_DT , GTR.GD_TR_DLT_DT , GTR.GD_TR_IS_DLT , GTR.TR_CT_ID , GTRI.GD_TR_IMG_URL , UI.USR_FNM , UI.USR_LNM , UI.USR_GNDR , UI.GD_PRFL_IMG , UI.USR_BD , UI.USR_GD_EXP , TI.TR_INCLD , TD.TR_DTL_INF , TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), UI.USR_BD) / 12) AS GUIDE_AGE FROM GD_TR_RCRT GTR LEFT JOIN GD_TR_RCRT_IMG GTRI ON GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTRI.GD_TR_PST_ID LEFT JOIN GD_TR_RVW GTRV ON GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTRV.GD_TR_PST_ID INNER JOIN USR_INF UI ON UI.USR_ID = GTR.USR_ID INNER JOIN TOUR_INCLD TI ON TI.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID INNER JOIN TR_DTL TD ON TD.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID WHERE GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID = #{_parameter}

SELECT GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID , GTR.ATHR_ID , GTR.USR_ID , GTR.GD_TR_TTL , GTR.GD_TR_ST_DT , GTR.GD_TR_ED_DT , GTR.GD_TR_PRPS , GTR.GD_TR_MP , GTR.GD_TR_PRC , GTR.GD_TR_SMRY , GTR.GD_TR_RSTR_DT , GTR.GD_TR_MDFY_DT , GTR.GD_TR_DLT_DT , GTR.GD_TR_IS_DLT , GTR.TR_CT_ID , GTRI.GD_TR_IMG_URL , GTR.GD_TR_MX_NP , C.CITY_NAME , ( SELECT AVG(gtr2.GD_TR_RVW_RTNG) FROM GD_TR_RVW gtr2 WHERE gtr2.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID) AS AVG_RVW FROM GD_TR_RCRT GTR LEFT JOIN GD_TR_RCRT_IMG GTRI ON GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTRI.GD_TR_PST_ID LEFT JOIN GD_TR_RVW GTRV ON GTR.GD_TR_PST_ID = GTRV.GD_TR_PST_ID JOIN CITIES C ON C.CITY_ID = gtr.TR_CT_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GD_TR_RCRT GTR (GD_TR_PST_ID , ATHR_ID , USR_ID , GD_TR_TTL , GD_TR_ST_DT , GD_TR_PRPS , GD_TR_MP , GD_TR_PRC , GD_TR_SMRY , GD_TR_RSTR_DT , GD_TR_MDFY_DT , GD_TR_DLT_DT , GD_TR_IS_DLT , TR_CT_ID , GD_TR_ED_DT , GD_TR_MX_NP) VALUES ('GT-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_GD_TR_RCRT_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, 0) , 'USR-20241029-000090' , NULL , #{gdTrTtl} , TO_DATE(#{gdTrStDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , #{gdTrPrps} , #{gdTrMp} , #{gdTrPrc} , #{gdTrSmry} , SYSDATE , NULL , NULL , 'N' , #{trCtId} , TO_DATE(#{gdTrEdDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , #{gdTrMxNp})
